She joined GDMPC just this year. She hopes to have much greater revenue for expansion of her business someday.

loans.use: to buy more soaps and powders used in her business.

loans.name: Bobomurod

texts.ru: Бобомурод проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Бобомурод имеет пекарню, где печет хлеб для продажи. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для покупки необходимых продуктов, чтобы печь лепешки.
texts.en: Bobomurod lives in the Dangara region.  He is 50 years old.  He is married and has three children.  Bobomurod owns a bakery where he bakes bread for sale.  He has a lot of experience in this area. He is taking out a loan to purchase ingredients to bake flatbread.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for flatbread

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian tiene 27 años, es una mujer alegre y amable, además de ser trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Su pareja es Jorge con quien vive en su casa propia, junto a sus padres, dos hermanos y un sobrino.

Su actividad es la venta de bebidas gaseosas de diferentes marcas y sabores, además de parrilladas los sábados y domingos, en el frontis de su casa. Tiene más de 20 años dedicándose  a este negocio y por el momento sólo cuenta con el apoyo ocasional de su hermano, quien atiende a los clientes cuando ella está fuera de casa. Considera a su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja. 
Anteriormente tuvo dificultades, pues la condición económica de su hogar era precaria, dificultándole el poder estudiar, entonces buscó un oficio y empezó con su negocio. Le gusta su trabajo por los ingresos económicos, ser independiente y estar en la comodidad de su casa, donde puede tener tiempo para dedicarlo a otras actividades. Tiene planes de crecer e incursionar en la venta de ropa. 

Éste es su primer préstamo con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de esta ayuda financiera para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues le gusta el trabajo que vienen realizando apoyándose entre sí.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio con bebidas, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras al contado y en volumen.
texts.en:
Lilian, 27 years old, is a happy and kind woman. She is also a hard-worker with a great desire to move forward. Her partner is Jorge, who she lives with in their own house with her parents, two brothers, and a nephew.

Lilian sells various brands and flavors of soft drinks, in addition to barbecuing on Saturdays and Sundays in front of her house. She has worked in this business for over 20 years and at the moment, she only depends on the occasional help from her brother, who attends to customers when she is out of the house. She considers her business profitable due to the profits that she makes. 

Previously, she had difficulties since the economic condition in her home was unstable, making it difficult for her to study. Therefore, she looked for a job and started her own business. She likes her job because of the income, and because she can be independent and be in the comfort of her own home, where she has time to dedicate to other activities. She has plans to grow and venture into clothing sales. 

This is her first loan with the MFP institution. She seeks this financial help so she can achieve her goals. Also, she says that she feels good with the communal bank, and that she likes the work that they fulfill by helping individuals within the group.

With this requested sum of 1000 nuevo soles, she will invest in buying merchandise to stock her business with drinks, looking for the lowest prices in cash and volume for her purchases.

loans.use: to increase merchandise.

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих сыновей и одну дочку. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродуктов, такие как лук, морковь и кукуруза. В бизнесе помогает его дружная семья. Илхом хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян кукурузы и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Ilhom is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and is raising three sons and a daughter.  For over 6 years he has been growing and selling agricultural products such as onions, carrots and corn.  His close family helps him in his business.  Ilhom would like to take out a loan to purchase corn seeds and fertilizer.  He hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.fr: Agée de 26 ans, Yvonne est mariée et mère de trois enfants scolarisés. Le plus âgé a 11 ans et le moins âgé a 7 ans. Coiffeuse de formation, elle y associe la vente des céréales, des macaronies et des produits de beauté. Yvonne s'approvisionne dans les marchés de la place. Pour améliorer sa capacité d'approvisionnement et satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev.
texts.en:
At 26 years old, Yvonne is married and the mother of three children who attend school. The eldest is 11 years old and the youngest is 7.

A hairdresser by training, Yvonne combines this with the sale of grains, pasta, and beauty products. Yvonne gets her supplies from the local markets. In order to improve her supply capacity and meet customer demand, she has sought and obtained a micro-loan from Finadev.

loans.use: To purchase four sacks of corn, two sacks of rice, one sack of beans, two boxes of macaroni, and two boxes of beauty products of varying quality.

loans.name: Flor De Mayo 2 Group

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una señora joven de 29 años de edad, es casada con el señor Lomelí quien se dedica al campo y tienen 2 hijos, uno se llama José Luis de 13 años quien estudia 1° de secundaria y Paulina, tiene 8 años y cursa el 3° de la primaria.
Elizabeth se dedica a la venta de gelatinas y chicharrones, actividades que realiza en su casa. Cada ocho días va a un poblado llamado "Ayutla de los Libres" a surtirse para poder elaborar las Gelatinas, donde compra sus ingredientes: concentrados para gelatinas de sabores, azúcar, vasos, cucharitas, etc. Para preparar los chicharrones compra bolsitas, aceite y salsa entre otras cosas pues tiene que salir de su localidad para poder encontrar sus ingredientes más económicos y poder tener más ganancias en eso va a invertir su próximo préstamo.
Elizabeth es una de las integrantes del Grupo Flor de Mayo 2 grupo integrado por 13 mujeres  responsables dedicadas a su trabajo que son: Gumecinda, Clarita, Eliz, Elizabeth, Julieta, Odilia, Rufina, Luz Elena, Adela, Luisa, Eustorgia, Noelia, Imelda quienes se dedican a la venta de: Pollos, Pan, Queso, Abarrotes, Perfumes, Gelatinas, Carne de Res y Puerco, Verduras, Chicharrones, Nanches y Frijoles.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a young woman of 29. She is married to Lomelí, who does farm work, and they have 2 children, one named José Luis, age 13, who is in the first year of secondary school, and Paulina, age 8, who is in the third year of primary school. 

Elizabeth works selling gelatines and chicharrones [fried pork], which she does at her home. Every eight days she goes to a villages called "Ayutla de los Libres" to stock up so she can make her gelatines. There she buys her ingredients: concentrates for flavored gelatines, sugar, cups, spoons, etc. To prepare the chicharrones, she buys small bags, oil and sauce among other items. She has to travel from the place where she lives so that she can find the ingredients at more economical prices, so she can have greater earnings, and this is how she will invest her next loan. 

Elizabeth is one of the members of the "Grupo Flor de Mayo 2" ["May Flower Group 2"], which is made up of 13 women who are responsible and dedicated to their work. They are: Gumecinda, Clarita, Eliz, Elizabeth, Julieta, Odilia, Rufina, Luz Elena, Adela, Luisa, Eustorgia, Noelia, and Imelda, who work selling Chickens, Bread, Cheese, Groceries, Perfumes, Gelatines, Beef and Pork, Vegetables, Chicharrones, Nanches fruits and Beans.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making gelatine snacks: milk, gelatine concentrates, cups, sugar, etc.

location.town: Tonala, Ayutla de los Libres, Gro.

loans.name: Jeanne Yabo

texts.fr: Jeanne Yabo est mariée et mère de deux enfants. L'aîné a plus de 30 ans et le second a 25 ans. Elle est spécialisée dans la vente de pagnes, de divers et s'approvisionne dans les marchés du Bénin. Jeanne Yabo a plus de deux enfants à charge qui l'aident dans la préparation d'huile de palme. Soucieuse de renforcer son fonds de commerce et maximiser son intérêt, elle fait recours au financement de Finadev. Jeanne Yabo envisage acheter un terrain de palmier.
texts.en:
Jeanne Yabo is married and the mother of two children. The eldest is past 30 and the second is 25 years old.

She specializes in the sale of pagnes [traditional cloths] and sundries, and gets her supplies in Benin's markets. Jeanne Yabo is responsible for more than two children, who help her make palm oil. Anxious to strengthen her business and maximize her interest, she has turned to Finadev's financing.

Jeanne Yabo hopes to purchase a field of palm trees.

loans.use: 30 lengths of pagne [traditional cloth] of varying quality and 25 baskets of palm nuts.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 45 years old, married and has two children. 

Nenita is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Nenita requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Nenita has been raising pigs for two years now and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Nenita would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retail business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of rice to sell to her customers.

Rosalina has been in this business for five years. Rosalina earns more income from raising pigs and running a general store.

Rosalina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 41 years old and married with three children.

Vivian works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like bread, canned goods and other groceries to sell.

Vivian has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and earns additional income from raising pigs.

Vivian hopes to expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like bread, canned goods and other groceries to sell.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras,ella vende zanahorias,tomates,cebollas y lechugas,la socia esta vendiendo en el mercado,la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tomates,cebollas,zanahorias y lechugas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member works in the business of selling vegetables. She sells carrots, tomatoes, onions and lettuce. She sells in the market, working from 6:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. With this business, she gets her children ahead. Her dream is to expand the business selling vegetables. She is asking for the loan to buy tomatoes, onions, carrots, and lettuce wholesale. 

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy tomaotes, onions, carrots, and lettuce wholesale

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy more rice to sell to her customers.

Jinky has been in this business for 15 years. Jinky earns more income from vegetable vending and running a general store.

Jinky has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio David sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Mujeres Unidas” y sigue viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco. 

El socio David sigue dedicándose a la carpintería y elaborando muebles de madera. En esta oportunidad el socio David requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea desea comprar colchones y frazadas. 

El socio David agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
David is a member who continues to participate in the Communal Bank "Mujeres Unidas" (United Women) and lives in the city of Cusco. He continues to work in carpentry and produce wood furniture. David is taking this opportunity to request a loan for personal use. He wants to buy mattresses and blankets.

David is grateful for the support that has been provided and promises to complete his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy mattresses and blankets.

loans.name: Santa Monica Group

texts.es:
EL GRUPO SANTAMONICA ES UN GRUPO SOLIDARIO DE CREDITUYO,ESTA INTEGRADO POR 6 PERSONAS.ELLAS SON  VECINAS  SE CONOCEN DESDE HACE MAS DE 9 AÑOS, 5 DE ELLAS SON COMERCIANTES  SE DEDICAN ALA VENTA DE CALZADO,OTRAS ALA VENTA DE PRODUCTOS DE  BELLEZA SUS NOMBRES SON  ARELY ,MAYRA DEL CARMEN, LAURA , BRENDA ,ELVIA Y MILAGROS .
MAYRA DEL CARMEN, ES CASADA TIENE 2 HIJOS DE 13 Y 5 AÑOS DE EDAD.
ELLA SE DEDICA ALA VENTA DE CALZADO Y DE SUPLEMENTOS ALIMENTICIOS, DESDE HACE MAS DE 6 AÑOS  ELLA VENDE ENTRE SUS CONOCIDOS Y FAMILIARES.
A ELLA LE GUSTA MUCHO LAS VENTAS,YA QUE  LO HACE EN SUS RATOS LIBRES  PARA NO DESCUIDAR A SUS HIJOS.
MAYRA UTILIZARA SU DINERO PARA SURTIR CALZADO Y PRODUCTOS NATURALES , PARA TENER MAYOR INVENTARIO  EN LOS  DOS RAMOS.
A MAYRA EN UN FUTURO LE GUSTARIA,LLEGAR A TENER UN LOCAL PARA LA VENTA DE  SUS PRODUCTOS NATURALES Y OFRECERLES A SUS VECINAS LA VENTA DE DESAYUNOS  MAS NUTRITIVOS .Y TAMBIEN QUIERE LLEGAR A SER DUEÑA DE UNA ZAPATERIA , PARA PODERLES DAR UN MEJOR FUTURO A SUS HIJOS Y PODERLES PAGAR ESTUDIOS UNIVERSITARIOS.
texts.en:
The Santa Monica group is a loan support group, which is comprised of 6 people. They are neighbors who have known each other for more than 9 years. Five of them are merchants who make a living by selling shoes, and others sell beauty products. Their names are Arely, Mayra del Carmen, Laura, Brenda, Elvia, and Milagros.

Mayra del Carmen is married and has 2 children who are 13 and 5 years old. She makes a living by selling shoes and food supplements, and has done so for over 6 years. She sells these products to acquaintances and family members.

She really enjoys selling, and does so in her free time so she never neglects her children. Mayra will use the money to stock up on shoes and natural products in order to have a larger inventory in both business areas.

In the future, Mayra would like to have her own business to sell natural products and to offer healthier breakfasts to her neighbors. She also wants to become a shoe store owner, so she can provide a better future for her children and pay for their university studies.

loans.use: to stock up with food supplements and shoes

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de gas,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de gas y negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar gas,arroz,azucar,leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is still working at her store selling vegetables and selling natural gas. She sells rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She works from 5:00 p.m. until 7:00 p.m. With this business, she gets her children ahead. Her dream is to expand the business of selling natural gas and the business of the vegetable store. She is asking for the loan to buy natural gas, rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy natural gas, rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 51 years old and married with nine children. Five of her children are in school and Alicia works very hard to provide for them.

Alicia runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy stocks of groceries to sell in her store.

Alicia has been in this business for 16 years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Alicia would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Bienvenida

texts.en:
Bienvenida is 48 years old and married with seven children.  Six of her children are in school and Bienvenida works very hard to provide for them.

Bienvenida runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Bienvenida has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Bienvenida would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de ropa,la socia vende pantalones,blusas,casacas y chompas,la socia trabaja en forma independiente,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,la socia quiere tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas,chompas y casacas.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member continues to make her living in the business of buying and selling clothes. She sells pants, blouses, jackets, and sweaters. She works independently, and by means of this business she has carried her son forward in life. She wants to have a shop where she can sell clothing. She requests this loan in order to buy pants, blouses, sweaters, and jackets.

She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payment of her debt.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, sweaters, and jackets.

loans.name: Larrie

texts.en:
Larrie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Larrie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Larrie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is a married mother of nine dependents. She is 53 years old and lives in Mohon, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. Fe owns and operates a motorcycle transport business. She established the motorcycle transport business as a way of generating extra income of 2,600 PHP per month. She has been engaged in this type of service for three years. Fe requested a loan of 3,000 PHP from GDMPC. She intends to use the money from the loan to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories. Fe has been a good member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Fe wants to purchase more motorcycles to use in her business.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto tiene la edad  54 de  años, está divorciado, actualmente vive solo. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como el abono y plaguicidas para mantener su cafetal en optimas condiciones. El tienen como meta mejorar su plantación de café y aumentar su productividad de café para el próximo año. El pretende con esta mejorar generar más ingresos económicos para su bienestar propio y tener a futuro una estabilidad económica mejor.   Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alberto is 54 years old, divorced, and currently lives alone. He intends to use this loan to buy supplies, such as compost and pesticides, for maintaining optimal conditions for his coffee crop. His goal is to improve his coffee plantation and increase his productivity for next year. Alberto wants to generate more income for his own welfare and to have better financial stability in the future.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Alberto has not received any other loans from the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy compost and pesticides for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en: Warlita is a widow with nine children. She is 51 years old and lives in Matugas, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Warlita owns and operates a garden to earn a living. She has been in this business for seven years and earns 5,000 PHP each month. She requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and seedlings. Warlita has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. In the future, Warlita's plan is to save her returns in order to buy a car.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Loek

texts.en:
Loek is a 50-year-old married woman who permanently lives with her family in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. To earn a livelihood, she cultivates various kinds of crop and makes enough income to cover her daily expenses. Loek has tried hard in her business because she wants to ensure a bright future for her four children. 

At the present, she wants to borrow USD 1,000 to purchase an extra plot of farmland to increase her production. This loan will enable her to make improvements in her business as well as her living conditions. She plans to use her increased income to reinvest in her farming business and save for future emergencies of the family.

loans.use: to purchase an extra plot of farmland to increase her production.

loans.name: Mónica

texts.es:
Mónica tiene 43 años, es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de progresar. Su pareja es Dante, el padre de sus dos hijos: Isabel de 13 y Dante de 8 años de edad. La casa donde viven es propia.

La actividad que ella realiza es la crianza y venta de pollos, para eso cuenta con un pequeño galpón instalado en el patio trasero de su casa con una capacidad para 250 pollos, cuando están grandes y listos los vende a los comerciantes de los mercados. Lleva en este negocio cerca de 6 años, comenzando por iniciativa de su pareja quien notó la oportunidad. A ella le gusta su trabajo, pues le ha traído muchas satisfacciones tanto personales como económicas, ya que le ayuda a pagar los estudios de sus hijos, quienes son su mayor orgullo. Además las ganancias son buenas porque cuenta con bastante demanda en la zona. 
Viendo estos resultados y con sus ahorros, tiene planes de implementar un local en su casa para la venta de la carne de pollo, así generarse más ingresos económicos.

Éste es su segundo préstamo con la institución MFP. Se siente bien con su banco comunal, pues sus compañeros son muy unidos.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de 250 pollos bebé para iniciar una nueva campaña de crianza, más alimentos balanceados, y una vez listos ponerlos a la venta en su nuevo local en su casa.
texts.en:
Monica is 43 years old, hardworking woman, entrepreneurial and eager to get ahead. Her partner is Dante, the father of her two children: Isabel, who is 13 years old and Dante who is 8 years old. They own the house where they live. 

She makes a living raising and selling chickens, for that purpose, she has a coop in the backyard, with a capacity for 250 chickens, which when are large and ready she sells to the merchants of the market. 

She has been in this business about six years, which started as his partner initiative when he noticed the opportunity. She likes her work because it has given her lots of satisfaction both personally and economically, as it helps to pay her children’s studies, whom are her biggest proud. In addition, the profits are good because she has good demand in the area. 

Seeing these results and using her savings, she has plans to set up and store in her house to sell chicken meat and as a result have better revenues. 

This is her second loan with the field partner MFP. She feels good with her communal bank because her partners are very united. With the requested amount of 1500 new soles, she will buy 250 chicks, to start a new raising stage, more balanced food and once they are ready put them to sell in her new store.

loans.use: to buy chicks and balanced food.

loans.name: Dan

texts.es:
Dan tiene 39 años, es un hombre honesto, trabajador y sobre todo muy responsable. Vive con su pareja, en la casa de su suegra, junto a su hijo de 13 años, a quien crían juntos y desean brindar una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida.

Su trabajo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros y a veces de algunas cargas dentro y fuera de la ciudad en su motocarro. Desde muy temprano, sale en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros, quienes están en espera con la necesidad de transportarse de un lugar a otro. Lleva trabajando así por 13 años, y combina su profesión con este trabajo, pues es docente en una escuela primaria de la ciudad.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede realizar dos actividades al mismo tiempo, pues después de ir a realizar sus clases, sale otra vez a buscar los pasajeros. Le está yendo bien, ya que genera doble ingreso en su hogar.  Espera poder mantenerse como hasta ahora y más adelante comprar un motocarro más y trabajar con un chofer.

Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP, está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá más seguro de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo, ya que ahí son muy puntuales.
Con el monto solicitado, 1200 soles, comprará piezas para la refacción de su vehículo. Comprará el toldo, algunas llantas y pagará al mecánico que le hará todo el trabajo de restauración a su motocarro.
texts.en:
Dan is thirty-nine years old. He is an honest, a hard-working, and most of all, a responsible man. He lives with his wife in his mother-in-law's house, along with his thirteen-year old son whom they have raised together and for whom they want to provide a good education and a better quality of life.

His job consists of transporting passengers and sometimes some cargo in and out of the city on his motorcycle. He leaves very early in the morning in search of his eventual passengers, who wait needing to be transported from one place to the other. He has been working this way for thirteen years and supplements his profession with this job. He is a teacher at a primary school in the city.

What he likes about his job is that he is able to accomplish two activities at the same time, in that after he finishes his classes, he heads out again to look for passengers. This is going well for him, since he generates twice the income for his family. He hopes to be able to continue as he has up to this point, and in the future to buy another motorcycle and work with a chauffeur.

This is his second loan with MFP. He is very content to know that he will have some financial support, as this way he will feel more secure going forward with his business. On the other side, he promises once again to comply with the payment of his debts in a punctual way as he does not want to disappoint the other group members, who are very punctual.

With the requested amount—1200 PEN—he will buy parts for the refurbishment of his vehicle. He will buy a tarpaulin, some tires, and will pay the mechanic who will do all the restoration work on the motorcycle.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ela

texts.es:
Ela tiene 32 años, es una mujer buena y amable. Vive con su pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 8 años, en su casa propia.
Su trabajo consiste en el alquiler de sus motocarros. Lleva trabajando con este negocio ya por 2 años, y lo hace con la ayuda de su pareja, quien maneja una unidad y el otro lo maneja un chofer, quien paga diariamente como alquiler. Empezó a realizar esta actividad a raíz que empezaron a tener mayores necesidades en su hogar. Por ello, espera mantenerse y más adelante comprar más unidades.

Éste es su segundo crédito con la institución MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos de crecer y tener más. Es consciente de la responsabilidad que asume y hará todo lo posible para pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo. Espera que el grupo al que pertenece sea tan bueno como los préstamos anteriores, con responsabilidad y puntualidad.
Con el monto solicitado, 1200 soles, comprará piezas, repuestos y pagara al mecánico para hacer la refacción total de sus dos vehículos.
texts.en:
Ela, 32, is a good, friendly woman. She lives with her husband, with whom she has an 8 year old son. They own their home.

Her job is renting out her motorcycle taxis. She's been doing this for 2 years with the help of her husband, who drives one of the units; another cabbie drives the other and pays daily for his rental. She started this when they began having greater costs in their household. For that reason, she hopes to maintain her business and later to buy more units. 

This is her second loan with MFP, and she hopes to keep moving towards her objectives of growing and having more. She's aware of the responsibility that she's taking on and will do everything possible to make her payments on time. She hopes that the group she belongs to will be as good as with her previous loan, and will be responsible and punctual. 

With the 1200 soles requested she will buy replacement parts and pay the mechanic to fix both of her vehicles.

loans.use: to fix her motorcycles.

loans.name: Oleg

texts.en:
Oleg is a longtime farmer from Crimea. He is an experienced farmer and he manages his two hectares of land very well. He has been growing wheat, vegetables and beans. Recently, Oleg has found himself in a difficult situation due to the collapse of market prices for vegetables and wheat in Ukraine. Because Oleg is a small farmer, he finds it difficult to absorb the sharp fluctuation in food prices in Ukraine. However, Oleg is determined, and he came up with a plan to begin phasing out vegetables and wheat and begin planting grapes and strawberries. Grapes and strawberries – and fruits in general – have retained a high value on the Ukrainian market and Oleg believes that he can continue to farm if he switches to growing fruit. However, growing grapes and strawberries requires more delicate care. Oleg needs you to help him finance an irrigation system that can help him to promptly water strawberries and grapes which will result in a better crop that will not be lost due to spoilage.

Oleg is married and has two children: a son, who is 5, and daughter, who is 17. Oleg hopes to send his children to university. Oleg's entire family helps work the two hectares of land the family owns. Their land is relatively small, and that is why every crop counts and Oleg cannot afford for any crop to spoil.

loans.use: to purchase farm equipment

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy lives in Matugas Bajo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.  For 5 years he has been earning income through providing water refill and distibution services to support the needs of his family. Juvy gets an income of PHP 4,000 a month from this business. 

For a 22-year-old single man, there’s nothing more that can make him happy except to see his family living a life full of happiness. Juvy has borrowed the amount of PHP 10,000 from GDMPC Microcredit to procure more bottle water. He is new with GDMPC. His plan in the future is to hopefully improve his business.

loans.use: buy bottled water

loans.name: Kunthea's Group

texts.en:
Kunthea and her husband live in a house built from wood in Kompong Cham province.  They have been planting cassavas and farming rice in the raining season for five years to support their family.  Kunthea's business usually face challenges when the price of cassavas in the market drop. 

Kunthea has one child and he is still in school. This is the first time Kunthea is applying for a loan from VisionFund. She and her group member are requesting for approximately 250 US dollars each. As a group leader, Kunthea plans to use her portion of the loan to cultivate her plantation, buy fertilizers and pay labor fees. She hopes the loan will help her to grow more crops and make more income so that she can feed her family better and expand her business.

loans.use: to cultivate her plantation

loans.name: 03.1.81 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Phượng has a service business providing housing rentals. She is requesting a loan to build and repair houses for renting.  Phượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main hardship that Phượng faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Phượng is 35 years old and she is married with 2 children.  She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 81 Quảng Hưng Solidarity group. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, and has 2 dependents

In 2011, Phượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Phượng has successfully repaid 1 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to build and repair house for renting

loans.name: 08.phú Thọ 3 01 Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Tám operates a food stall selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell. Tám has been involved in this business for 3 years. The main harship that Tám faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Tám is 51 years old.  She is married and has 2 children.  She is the leader of a 7-member group, the 08.Phú Thọ 3. 01 Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group. Tám lives with no dependents (her children are grown up) in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tám's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  With her business profit, Tám hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: buy vegetables to resell

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is married and has 2 children.  She is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. Cynthia operates a service-based business providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for 2 years and every month she earns PHP 10,000 from this work. 

Cynthia has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in her business. Cynthia is new with GDMPC.  In the future, Cynthia hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: repair her transport vehicle

loans.name: 08.tây Sơn.03 Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Luyện has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase machines to provide tailor-made and clothes repair services.   Luyện has been involved in this business for 3 years. The main harship that Luyện faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Luyện is 32 years old.  She is married and has 2 children.  She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 08.Tây Sơn. 03 Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, and has 2 dependents

This is Luyện first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  With her business profit, Luyện hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: buy tailoring machines

loans.name: Cheng

texts.en:
Cheng is hard working mother has been operating a fish selling business in a local market to support her family. She is responsible two school-age children and she plans to educate them to become professional people so they might have a well-paid job in the future. 

Cheng’s husband is the main supplier in her business by going fishing along the Tole Sap River every day. For the small fish, she makes them into fish paste and puts in them in jars for selling.  She typically earns approximately USD 6 per day.

Cheng is now seeking a loan of USD 1,300 to purchase a medium-size boat for her husband to use in fishing. She believes that this loan will enable her family to make their business more viable and profitable. With the increased in income, she will use it to expand her business to achieve her goal.

loans.use: buy a fishing boat

loans.name: 04.tây Sơn Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Nguyệt has a retail business selling metal products. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make iron and aluminum goods to sell.  Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main hardship that Nguyệt faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Nguyệt is 58 years old.  She is married and has 2 children.  She is the leader of a 7-member group, the 08.Tây Sơn. 04 Phú Sơn solidarity group.  Nguyệt lives with no dependents (her children are grown up)  in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nguyệt's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.   With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy materials to make metal goods to sell

loans.name: Chingerel

texts.en:
Chingerel is 42 years old and lives with her three children in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. His husband passed away recently.  Two of her children are university students and the youngest attends a local secondary school. 

Chingerel started her dairy product retailing business in 2001 by renting a counter in the market. She sells milk and other products made with milk, such as curd, yogurt, cottage cheese, etc. Her shop location is good and her products are all qualified. Over the years she gained many trusted suppliers and regular customers. 

Chingerel is a sharp and hardworking woman who says "It has been hard since my husband passed away however, I can't afford to stand and feel sorry for myself. I have three children to support and one is in college."   She is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to purchase more milk from herders.

loans.use: purchase milk from herders

loans.name: Ely

texts.es:
Ely tiene 22 años, es una madre soltera luchadora muy joven, tiene un niño de 3 años. Trabaja duro para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Vive en casa de sus padres a lado de sus dos hermanos y su menor hijo.
Su trabajo consiste en la venta de productos varios como: ropa, juguetes, accesorios para el hogar y más. Realiza su labor de forma ambulatoria en las diversas calles de la ciudad, entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares. Lleva realizando esta actividad por 2 años y lo hace sola, ya que así gana más. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene ingresos a diario, le está yendo bien, siempre y cuando le dedique mucho tiempo. Tiene en mente implementar una tienda de juguetes para más adelante, hasta que consiga el capital.

Éste es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete, una vez más, a pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas y demostrar, como en anteriores oportunidades, que es una socia buena y así retribuir el apoyo que le brindan en su banco comunal, donde todos son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, 2500 soles, comprará más mercadería para seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ely, 22, is a very young single mother to a 3 year old son. She is a fighter. She works hard to be able to give her son a better quality of life. She lives in her parents' house with her two brothers and her young son. 

She sells various products like clothing, toys, home accessories and more. She sells door-to-door in the streets of the city, among her friends, neighbors and relatives. She has been doing this for two years and works alone because she earns more that way. What she likes about her work is that she makes daily income. It's going well as long as she puts a lot of time into it. She's thinking about starting a toy store later, once she has the capital.

This is her fourth loan with MFP, and she hopes to continue with her objectives. On her part, she promises once again to make her payments punctually and demonstrate, as with previous opportunities, that she's a good member and thus pay back the support that the village bank has given her. Everyone in the bank is very responsible and united.

With the requested 2500 soles she will be more merchandise to keep offering variety to her customers.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosa Matilde

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer muy entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Ica, esta ciudad  se caracteriza por tener un clima caluroso en cualquier época del año, asimismo e desarrolla agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros; también se encuentra la laguna de “Huacachina la cual se ubica en medio de unas dunas impresionantes y recibe muchos turistas en todo el año. Cuando tiene un tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear y en algunas ocasiones le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “arroz con Pollo”.

Con entusiasmo Rosa trabaja día a día en su negocio de venta de alfajores y cocadas, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene buena sazón para la preparación de sus dulces y es muy conocida.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar una mejoras en su local como pintado, arreglo de sus vitrina, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá ofrecer una mejor atención a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para realizar su más grande sueño.” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Rosa is a very enthusiastic woman. She lives in the city of Ica, which is known for having a hot climate in all seasons of the year. It is also known for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of cotton, grapes, and asparagus, among other things. Here one also encounters the Huacachina lagoon, which is located in the middle of some impressive dunes and receives many tourists throughout the year. When she has free time, Rosa likes to go out strolling and on some occasions she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, which is the delicious "rice with chicken."

With enthusiasm, Rosa works day by day in her business selling cakes and cocadas (coconut cookies). She dedicates around eight hours a day to her work and can attend up to fifteen clients in a day. She believes that things go well for her in the business because she has good taste in the preparation of her sweets and she is very knowledgeable.

Rosa is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the support that they have provided, she will be able to make repairs to her business premises, such as painting and repairing shop windows, among other things. In this way, she will be able to offer better service to her clients and thereby improve her earnings. This in turn will permit her to continue fighting to achieve her greatest dream, which is "to have a house of her own."

loans.use: to improve the premises (painting and repairing shop windows, among other things)

loans.name: Jurenda

texts.en:
For over three years, Jurenda, a 35-year-old married mother of five children, has made a living in Guingona, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental through the operation of a retail store selling a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.


In 2008, Jurenda joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 2,800 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, and soaps. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, and soaps.

loans.name: La Grace Divine 2 (#1) Group

texts.en: Suzanne, age 52, is a single mother with 5 children. She has 2 children still attending school. She also cares and provides for her elderly mother. Suzanne is representing the Grace Divine 2 (#1) borrowers' group. She operates an internet cafe in her local community, a business she has had for 4 years, and also owns a small food stand for extra income. She plans on using the loan to buy another computer and printer for the cafe. Her business strategy is to buy quality and modern computer equipment to attract customers. She saves until she can buy a good piece of equipment instead of buying many cheap pieces. Suzanne has received 1 previous loan from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good repayment record. As she continues to grow her internet cafe, Suzanne's goal is to open more cafes around Brazzaville. She hopes to use some of the profits from her business to send her children to study in Europe.

loans.use: to pay for a new printer and computer.

loans.name: La Grace Divine 2 (#2) Group

texts.en: Romaric, age 33, is single with 2 children. He has one child currently attending school. He also cares for his elderly father. Romaric is representing the Grace Divine 2 (#2) group. He operates a retail shop where he sells car parts. He has had this business for 2 years. He will use the loan to buy more car parts to stock his store. His business strategy is to sell his inventory on credit and give his customers 3 days to pay. Romaric has received 3 previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. He has a good repayment record. He would like to continue to expand and add on to his store, which he wants to grow into a large car parts shop. Romaric hopes to continue to be able to save some of his profits for his childrens' future.

loans.use: to pay for car parts.

loans.name: Le Travail (#1) Group

texts.en:
Genevieve, age 52, is single with 3 children. She is representing the Le Travail (#1) group. She sells fish and clothing in a local market. She has been selling these 2 products for 8 years. She has gained valuable customers over the years. She will use the loan to buy fish to replenish her stock. Her business stratgey is to study the market prices around the city and try to offer the most competitive prices. 
Genevieve has received 2 previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good repayment record. She would like to eventually travel abroad to buy merchandise for her store. She feels she can find a great variety of clothes at a better price outside of Brazzaville. She hopes that as her business grows she can improve her family's life.

loans.use: to pay for fish.

loans.name: Eben Ezer (#3) Group

texts.en: Merline, age 37, is single with one 14 year old daughter. She also takes care of her elderly father. Merline is representing the Eben Ezer (#3) group. She sells fish at a local market in Brazzaville and has been selling fish for 9 years! Over the years, she has acquired many customers and much experience. Merline will use the loan to buy fish in bulk, which gives her a cheaper price per fish and greater bargaining power with her supplier. Her business strategy is to offer a large variety of fish to attract more customers. Merline has received 4 previous loans with Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good repayment record. She wants to continue to grow her fish sales and become a large business. She plans to use the profits from her business to send her daughter overseas to study.

loans.use: to buy fish in bulk.

loans.name: Eben Ezer (#2) Group

texts.en:
Justin, age 43, is married with five children. His youngest is 2 years old and the oldest is 22 years old. He also provides and takes care of his elderly father. 

Justin is representing the Eben Ezer (#2) group. Justin operates a restaurant and snack shop. He has had this business for 4 years. He will use the loan to buy drinks for his restaurant including wine, beer, and assorted sodas. His business strategy is to play good music at his restaurant. He has found his customers like this very much. He also makes sure his drinks are always very cold.

Justin has received four previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. He has a good repayment record. He hopes to use the profits from his business to help his children be successful and to allow them to study abroad.

loans.use: to pay for wine and other assorted drinks.

loans.name: Amour Du Prochain 2 (#1) Group

texts.en:
Serge, age 44, is single with two school age children. He also provides and cares for his elderly father. Serge is representing the Amour du Prochain 2 (#1) group. He operates a creamery in a local market. In Congo it is common for individuals to own ice cream machines and serve soft serve ice cream on the street. He has had this business for five years. He will use the loan to buy milk, sugar, oil, salt, and flour. His biggest difficulty is the inconsistent electricity in the city, but he has found ways to work around this to stay profitable. He has overcome this problem and has continued to advance his business. 

Serge has received three previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. He has a good repayment record. He hopes to one day buy a parcel of land and build a home for his family.

loans.use: to pay for milk, sugar, oil, salt, and flour.

loans.name: Hilarie

texts.en: Hilarie is 42 years old. She has four children between the ages of 8 and 16. She has been selling bed sheets, towels, and bed covers. She wants the loan to buy more bed sheets and towels for resale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more bed sheets, towels, and bed covers

loans.name: Las Estrellas 2 Group

texts.es:
Angela tiene 50 años de edad es soltera, pero tiene una hija de 17 años, cursa el 2° del centro de bachillerato tecnológico agropecuario en el municipio de Florencio Villareal así que solo son ellas dos las que viven juntas.
Angela se dedica a la venta de pollo y pescados y tiene un negocio en el crucero de su localidad llamado "El Porvenir"; lleva 12 años con el negocio. Cuenta que lo que más vende es el pescado porque ya hay muchos comerciantes de pollo. Con el préstamo quiere comprar más mercancía para seguir en el mismo negocio ya que necesita más variedad de pescados para ofrecer a los clientes distintas opciones.

Angela es integrante del Grupo Las Estrellas 2 grupo formado por 10 mujeres trabajadoras que son capaces de sacar adelante a sus familias a continuación son mencionadas: Maria de Lourdes, Petra, Cruz, Nidia, Ariana, Virginia, Asucena, Zoila, Angela y Abad, y se dedican a la venta de: cena, recargas para celulares de la marca Telcel, productos de belleza, maíz, fierros para herrería, bolillos (pan), antojitos mexicanos, pollo, pescado, coco, limón y comida.
texts.en:
Angela, 50, is single and lives with her 17-year-old daughter who is studying at the agricultural technical high school in the town of Florencio Villareal.

Angela sells chicken and fish and has her own business at the crossroads in a town called "El Porvenir".  She has been in business for 12 years and claims she sells more fish because there are many chicken merchants.  With the loan she plans to buy more merchandise to continue in her business, since she needs to buy more variety of fish to give her customers different options.

Angela is a member of the communal bank "Las Estrellas 2", which is comprised of ten working women who are able to provide for their families.  They are: Maria de Lourdes, Petra, Cruz, Nidia, Ariana, Virginia, Asucena, Zoila, Angela and Abad.  They sell: meals, Telcel cell phone recharges, beauty products, corn, hardware, bread, Mexican snack food, chicken, fish, coconut, lemon and food.

loans.use: To buy different kinds of fish such as carp, skate, flathead, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Pedro Antonio de 53 años de edad de actividad comerciante, con tres hijos mayores de edad, está solicitando el crédito para las mejoras de vivienda, ya que quiere realizar la construcción de un cuarto, desde hace cuatro años quiere realizar las mejoras pero por falta de capital no la había podido construir. a través de los prestamos que ha recibido de fundación león 2000 el ha demostrado que su situación económica ha cambiando ya que ha mejorado poco a poco la casa ya que ha sido uno de sus mayores sueños, el financiamiento lo invertirá en la compra de material para construcción como: cemento, cal, hierro, madera, alambre, clavos, entre otros materiales.
texts.en: Pedro Antonio, 53, is a merchant with three adult children.  He is requesting a loan to renovate his house by adding on a room.  For four years he has been wanting to carry out improvements but was lacking the capital to do so.  With the loans he has received from the Fundación León 2000 he has demonstrated that his economic situation has changed and made gradual home improvements, which was one of his major goals.  He plans to use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement, limewater, iron, wood, wire, nails and other materials.

loans.use: To buy cement, limewater, iron, wood, wire, nails and other materials.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 55 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y muy responsable. Está casado y es padre de dos hijos, quienes son mayores e independientes, inclusive ya es abuelo de una nieta de 16 años, quien vive a su lado y depende de él y su esposa para darle educación y una buena crianza. Él tiene una casa propia, donde brindo lo mejor que tenía a sus hijos y ahora da todo por su nieta.

Su trabajo es el transporte de carga y pasajeros en su motocarro, dentro y fuera de la ciudad, dependiendo a dónde quieren, sus eventuales pasajeros, que los movilice. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 8 años, al momento de empezar le costó mucho esfuerzo, pues no estaba acostumbrado a hacer este tipo de trabajo y tubo muchos problemas de salud (renales), pero al pasar el tiempo encontró la manera de hacerlo mejor y ahora es todo un experto. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite manejar su propio horario y darse él mismo el descanso necesario cuando siente que lo necesita, además de tener un medio de transporte para su familia. No siente ninguna presión para poder realizar su trabajo, ahora le está yendo regular, ya que la demanda está baja; pero tiene en mente implementar una tienda de abarrotes en su hogar y así poder tener ingresos adicionales.

Éste es su préstamo número 8 con MFP. Está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en sus anteriores créditos. También está feliz con el grupo de trabajo al que pertenece, pues todos son muy responsables y sobre todo solidarios entre sí.
Con el monto solicitado, 1200 soles, comprará piezas para el arreglo de su motocarro, pagará al mecánico que le realizará todos los trabajos, y comprará su tarjeta de circulación, ya que la necesita para trabajar en la ciudad.
texts.en:
Francisco, 55, is a good, kind man who is very responsible.  He is married and has two children who are adults and live independently.  He is also a grandfather with a 16-year-old granddaughter who lives with him and depends on him and his wife for a good education and upbringing.  He has his own house where he provided all he could to his children and now to his granddaughter.

His work consists of transporting cargo and passengers by motorcycle, in and around the city and depending on where his customers need to go.  He has been in business for eight years; and it took much effort to get started, as he was not accustomed to this type of work and had health problems (kidneys).  Over time he figured out how to do his job better and now he is an expert.  What he enjoys about his work is that he can manage his own schedule and take whatever time off he needs.  He also has a means of transport for the family.  He does not feel any pressure carrying out his activity although business is not at its best because demand is down.  But he is thinking about opening a grocery store in his home for extra income.

This is his eighth loan through MFP.  He is happy about the financial support and is sure this will help him advance in his work.  Also, he is committed to paying it back on time as with his previous loans.  He likes the communal bank he belongs to because everyone is responsible and supportive of each other.

He plans to use the 1,200 PEN to buy spare parts for his vehicle and pay the mechanic for all the repairs.  He will also buy a permit to work in the city.

loans.use: To repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Tsetsegdelger

texts.en: Tsetsegdelger is 54 years old and lives with her husband and 5 daughters in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Bulgan province. The borrower worked as an accountant at the mining and processing plant in Erdenet and quit it because of  her older daughter's illness. She started her cafeteria business in Bulgan province but unfortunately she stopped this business because there was a fire. Since 2003 she has been cleaning other families' trash, cutting wood and collecting bottles and cans to give them as raw materials and make money from them. Starting from 2006 she started her business making cotton bags, planting potatoes, sacking and selling wood and engaging in a greenhouse. Now she is doing business in chicken farming and making cotton bags. The family atmosphere is amiable and warm. She spent a lot of money treating her older daughter's brain cancer. Now, life is getting better thanks to engaging in her own business. The standard of living is average. She is hardworking, an overachiever and open-minded in business. She is requesting a loan with of 3,200,000 MNT to purchase a green house.

loans.use: To purchase a green house

loans.name: Zenitha

texts.en: Zenitha is from Tinago, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She is 40 years old. Zenitha is married and has two children. Zenitha used her last loan to buy raw materials to use in making viands for selling cooked food. Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to purchase new equipment and tools to expand her business. In the future she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase new equipment and tools to expand her business.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José tiene 32 años, vive con su pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 10 años, por quien trabaja mucho para brindarle una buena educación y alimentación.
Su trabajo es el alquiler de motocarros. Desde muy temprano se levanta a esperar a sus dos choferes, quienes le dan pago diario. Pero además de este negocio, trabaja en una panadería, donde luego de  cinco años fue ahorrando poco a poco y logró comprar sus dos motocarros.
Esta actividad le permite tener un ingreso adicional a su economía, ya que a diario ingresa dinero a su casa, le está yendo bien.

Éste es su segundo préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Se compromete a ser un cliente puntual y trabajar bien con el grupo al que pertenece, ya que ve que son muy buenos, amables y sobre todo muy unidos.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 soles, comprará piezas para la refacción de sus vehículos, además renovará la documentación de circulación que está a punto de vencerse.
texts.en:
José, 32, lives with his partner and 10-year-old son, who he works hard for in order to provide him with a good education and nutrition.  He rents motorcycles for a living and gets up very early to meet the drivers who pay him daily.  Apart from this business he works at a bakery, where he has been able to save enough money over a five-year period to buy the two motorcycles.  This also allows him to earn extra income on a daily basis for the household, so things are going well for him.

This is his second loan through MFP.  It will allow him to continue with his objectives.  He is committed to paying it back on time and working well with the group he belongs to, the members of which are all good, kind people and very united.

With the 1,500 PEN he plans to buy spare parts for his vehicles and renovate his business permit which is about to expire.

loans.use: To repair his motorcycle.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 64 años, es una buena mujer, amable y muy luchadora. Es soltera, pero madre de seis hijos, quienes son mayores de edad e independientes. Tiene una casa propia donde vive sola. Desde hace mucho tiempo decidió trabajar duro para educar y alimentar a sus hijos, quienes ahora ya mayores y aportan con algunos gastos que ella necesita.

Su trabajo consiste en tres actividades. Primero es la venta de abarrotes, realiza las compras al por mayor y se encarga de vender al menudeo, de este negocio saca un promedio de 25% de ganancia de acuerdo a su inversión. Su segundo trabajo consiste en la costura, realiza sus propias creaciones y pedidos para algunos clientes. Y por último cría cerdos, posee muchos y dentro de ellos tiene una que está preñada. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener tiempo para poder realizar las tres actividades, le está yendo muy bien, siempre tiene pedidos de sus chanchos y los vende a un buen precio. Espera poder seguir manteniendo en creciente su trabajo y poder tener un espacio más grade para criar más animales.

Éste es su préstamo numero 10 con MFP, por tanto espera cumplir con su objetivo de seguir creciendo. Está muy contenta de trabajar con su banco comunal, ya que todos se mostraron muy responsables, hasta ahora, esto le impulsa y compromete a seguir siendo responsable en sus pagos.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, comprará mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes, también alimentos balanceados para sus animales y algunas vacunas y vitaminas que les tiene que poner a los cerditos que están por nacer.
texts.en:
Juana, 64, is a kind, good woman who is very determined.  She is single, but the mother of six children who are all adults and independent.  She lives in her own house and decided long ago to work hard to educate and feed her children.  They are now grown and help out with her expenses when necessary.

She is involved in three different business activities.  The first is selling groceries which she buys wholesale to sell retail.  Her average profit margin in this business is 25%.  Her second job is working as a seamstress, making her own creations based on customer orders.  Lastly, she raises pigs and has many, one of which is pregnant.  What she enjoys about her work is that she has time to do all three and it is going well.  She always has orders for pigs and they are selling at a good price.  She hopes to be able to continue growing and have a larger space for more animals.

This is her tenth loan through MFP, so she hopes to continue with her objective to keep growing.  She is happy with her communal bank since all of the members are responsible, which motivates her to be responsible in making her payments.  She plans to use the 1,000 PEN to buy more goods for her grocery store.  Also, she will buy balanced animal feed, vaccines and vitamins for the piglets about to be born.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Victor tiene 68 años de edad, pero tiene el espíritu y la alegría de un joven de 20 años, vive al lado de su esposa quien es su mano derecha en todo y sobre todo porque es su apoyo incondicional, asimismo tienen 2 hijos de 21 y 15 años a quienes quiere mucho y sobre todo darían si vida con tal de darles lo mejor. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Chincha, esta ciudad se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido así como también es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, también es muy conocido porque sus pobladores tiene  una habilidad para la preparación de platillos. Cuando Victor tiene un tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión en especial, los noticieros ya que le gusta saber el acontecer en nuestro país; asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima Carapulcra con sopa seca; el solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado tener una profesión.

Con mucho esfuerzo Victor trabaja en su negocio de venta de alfajores , él le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque sus alfajores son deliciosos y sobre todo porque atiende de manera amable a sus clientes.

Victor está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar insumos para la preparación de sus alfajores como leche, azúcar, harina, mantequilla y manjar blanco, de esta manera podrá tener los ingredientes necesarios para elaborar sus productos; así el seguirá trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y ser un especialista en dulces”.
texts.en:
Victor is 68 years of age, but has the spirit and cheerfulness of a 20-year-old. He lives alongside his wife who acts as his right hand in everything and, above all, provides him unconditional support. They have two children, ages 21 and 15, who they love dearly and for whom they try to provide the best in life. Victor's home is located in the city of Chincha, which is known for its warm climate and also for being the site of the greatest victories in Peruvian sports. Chincha is also well-known because its inhabitants have the ability to prepare food. Victor enjoys watching television whenever he has free time, especially the news because he likes to find out about the events that are taking place around the country. In addition, he enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes, which is the flavorful "carapulcra" (a spicy Peruvian stew served with dried potatoes). Victor only has a high school education, but he would have liked to have pursued a profession.

With great effort, Victor works in his business selling "alfajores" (shortbread cookies with a sweet filling). He dedicates approximately 10 hours each day to his business and is able to serve up to 15 customers in a day. Victor believes he is doing well in his business because his "alfajores" are delicious and he attends to his customers in a friendly manner.

He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help he is receiving, Victor will be able to buy supplies for preparing his "alfajores" such as milk, sugar, flour, butter, and "manjar blanco" (a sweet dairy confection that is similar to caramel) since these are the necessary ingredients for making his products. He will continue to work each day to fulfill his greatest dream of having a house of his own and becoming a specialist in sweets.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, flour, butter, and "manjar blanco".

loans.name: Gretty Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia es una mujer de 34 años, casada con Marco un empleado privado con quien tiene dos hijos y juntos viven en "santo Domingo" que es un cantón de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" el cual es uno de los más densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que está el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la “Y del Colorado”.  Santo Domingo es un cantón privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno. 

Virginia desde hace 2 años abrió un pequeño local de comida. Este negocio lo aprendió de su familia. Vende comida a base de plátano verde, menestra de fréjol o lenteja y carnes asadas que es lo típico en las regiones pertenecientes a la costa Ecuatoriana. Su local queda frente a una tiendita de barrio y ha tenido gran acogida. Actualmente tiene pocas mesas y en general pocos implementos para atender a su clientela por lo que requiere de un crédito para comprar implementos nuevos y renovar los que actualmente tiene. Con esta inversión ella espera satisfacer la demanda de su clientela y proyectarse a seguir creciendo ya que su sueño es tener un restaurante completo y bonito. Ella quiere dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida con lo que podrá cumplir su anhelo que es ver a sus hijos con un título universitario.
texts.en:
Virginia is a 34-year-old woman who is married to Marco, a private employee. They have two children and live in Santo Domingo, which is a canton in the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, one of the most populated in Ecuador. This area has great appeal because it has several monuments located throughout the city, such as the Monument to the Colorado Indian, otherwise known as "Y del Colorado". Santo Domingo is a privileged canton with wonderful, hardworking, and enterprising people who strive tirelessly for development and progress. Tourists are always received with open arms and they take away the knowledge of this marvelous culture and setting.

Virginia opened a small food establishment two years ago. She learned this business from her family. Virginia sells food such as green bananas, bean or lentil soup, and roasted meats since these are traditional to the regions along the Ecuadorian coast. Her establishment is located in front of small neighborhood store and has been well-received. At the moment, she has few tables and not many utensils for serving her customers. For this reason, Virginia is requesting a loan in order to buy new utensils and to repair what she already has. With this investment, she expects to satisfy the demands of her customers and projects to continue growing. Her dream is to have a complete and beautiful restaurant. Virginia wants to give her family a better quality of life so that she can fulfill her wish of seeing her children receive a university degree.

loans.use: to repair the equipment and furniture in her restaurant.

loans.name: Linder

texts.es:
Linder tiene 42 años, es un hombre con muchas ganas de progresar y muy responsable pues desea darle lo mejor a su familia. Está casado y tiene tres hijos de 20, 16 y 4 años. Tiene una casa propia donde vive a lado de sus hijos y su esposa.

Su trabajo es el transporte de carga y pasajeros en su motocarro. Sale desde muy temprano en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros, se moviliza de un lugar a otro en busca de clientes para generar mayores ganancias en su día. Posee dos motocarros, el otro lo maneja un chofer quien le paga diariamente. Adicionalmente, como tiene muchos amigos, les ofrece algunos productos que trae de la ciudad de Lima como: ropa y zapatillas. Lleva trabajando con su motocarro ya por 11 años, mientras que en la venta de ropa y zapatillas recién 2 años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo que le permite disponer de su tiempo, ya que él tiene una profesión también. Es docente de una institución educativa y trabaja medio tiempo ahí y el resto de las horas del día se dedica al transporte, es por eso que le está yendo bien, ya que genera ingresos por todos lados.

Éste es su tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por su parte, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. Está muy contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal y poder conformar el grupo, pues todos son personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 soles, comprará toldos para sus motocarros, además de llantas y piezas del motor. También pagará al mecánico que le brindará el servicio.
texts.en:
Linder is 42 years old. He has a great desire to make progress and he is very responsible in order to give the best to his family. He is married and he has three children who are 20, 16, and four years old. He has his own house where he lives with his children and wife. 

His work consists of transporting cargo and passengers by motorcycle. He goes out very early to look for passengers. He moves from one place to another looking for customers in order to generate the most earnings for the day. He has two motorcycles. The other is driven by a driver who he pays daily.  In addition, since he has many friends, he offers some products that he brings from the city of Lima like: clothing and sneakers. He has worked with his motorcycle for 11 years. He has been selling clothing and athletic shoes for two years. What he likes about his work is that it allows him to arrange his time since he now has a profession also. He is on staff at an educational institution. He spends half his time working there and the rest of the day he dedicates to transportation.  For this reason, he is doing well since he is generating earnings from different places. 

This is his third credit with MFP. He hopes to continue with his objectives. He promises, once again, to make his payments, like with the earlier credits that he has had. He is very happy to belong to his communal bank and he can be satisfied with the group since every person is responsible and supportive. 
With the requested loan of 1500 soles, he will buy awnings for his motorcycles. In addition, he will buy tires and motor pieces. Also, he will pay the mechanic for offering his services.

loans.use: repair his motorcycles.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Ousmane est exerce depuis son jeune âge, les activités d'élevage et d'agriculture.Son père disposait de larges espaces de terre sur lesquelles il cultivait de l'arachide et du mil.Aujourd'hui Ousmane a hérité de ces terres et des quelques bêtes qui restent du troupeau de son père. Face à la rareté des pluies, il est obligé d'adopter l'embouche bovine comme nouvelle méthode d'élevage.Il achète ainsi périodiquement de boeufs qu'il engraisse pendant  7 à 8 mois avant de les revendre sur les marchés locaux.Cette activité lui permet de générer des revenus consistants qui lui assure la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de sa femme  et de ses sept enfants. Afin de faire une nouvelle opération d'embouche , il sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter 2 boeufs. Son ambition est de reconstituer petit à petit le troupeau familial.
texts.en:
Ousmane started farming and breeding animals at a young age. His father owned larges plots of farming land where he used to grow groundnuts and millet. Ousmane inherited this land and the few heads of cattle remaining from his father’s herd.  

The lack of rain forced him to take on the activity of cattle fattening as an alternative method of breeding. He occasionally buys oxen that he fattens over a period of seven to eight months and sells at the local markets. This activity brings in steady income that allows him to support his wife and seven children. 

He is seeking a loan of 400,000 F to buy two oxen for his next fattening operation. His goal is to reassemble the family herd, one step at a time.

loans.use: to buy two oxen.

loans.name: Rosmeri

texts.es: Rosmeri  se dedica a la comercialización de productos de bisutería que ella misma elabora. Así mismo vende mercancía variada, como productos de cacharrería, artículos para el hogar perfumes, hilos, cubrelechos etc.  Rosmerí  inició su negocio hace 10 años,  haciendo y vendiendo collares, pulseras etc., ella es autodidacta de las artesanías y muy observadora, de lo que hay en el mercado y así moderniza sus diseños  e impacta su mercado.  Posteriormente cuando Rosmeri construyó su mercado doméstico, agregó otros artículos para venderlos  mediante crédito a clientes con los que planeaba la forma de pago de acuerdo a sus ingresos y posibilidades. Así es como funciona actualmente pero su clientela ha aumentado y lograr satisfacerla con productos que estas piden es su gran desafío. Su meta es tener un almacén bien organizado, con una gran variedad de artículos, que compran usualmente los clientes, porque forman parte de su necesidad. En la actualidad está planeando un credikiva, primer crédito que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará accesorios para diseñar nuevos productos y  también mercancías varias,  que han encargado sus clientes y que rotarán rápidamente, porque comprará  a la medida de las exigencias de sus clientes y esta es justamente su razón de éxito.
texts.en:
Rosmeri sells trinkets that she produces herself. At the same, she sells various merchandise such as hardware products, household goods, perfumes, thread, bedspreads, and other items. Rosmeri started her business 10 years ago buy making and selling necklaces, bracelets, and other pieces. She is self-taught in her craft and very observant of what exists in the marketplace. This enables her to modernize her designs and dazzle her customers. After she became established in the marketplace, Rosmeri added other items to sell and extended credit to her customers so that they could pay based on the their income and means. Even though this is how she currently functions, her customer base has increased and Rosmeri wants to keep them satisfied with products they have requested. This is a great challenge for her. Her goal is to have a well-organized store with a wide variety of products that her customers usually buy since this is a necessity for her.

At the moment, Rosmeri is applying for a Kiva loan, her first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. The money will be used to buy accessories for designing new products and various types of merchandise that have been ordered by her customers. Her inventory has quick turnover because she buys according to the wants of her customers, which explains why she is successful.

loans.use: to buy accessories for designing new products and to acquire various merchandise.

loans.name: Soun's Group

texts.en:
Soun, age 42, is married and has four children. Three of her children stay with the family and earn money as paid workers. 

To help support the family's daily living costs, Soun has been farming rice for approximately 20 years. Although her children have incomes, the family still does not have enough food. 

Soun has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles. Her group member has been with VisionFund for four loan cycles. 

They are now requesting another loan after completely paying their previous loans. As the group leader, Soun will use a portion of the loan to cultivate her rice field, buy fertilizers for her crops and pay labor fees. She hopes this loan will enable her family to enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to cultivate her rice field, buy fertilizers for her crops and pay labor fees.
